# simple-button

## Examples

```.html
  <simple-button label="I'm a simple button"></simple-button>
```

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute    | Description           | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | ------------ | --------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `showNbOfClick` | `show-click` | Show number of clicks | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `theme`         | `theme`      | theme                 | `string`  | `'primary'` |
